channel.title: Bits, Bytes, Late Nights
channel.description: Recent content on Bits, Bytes, Late Nights

item.title: Hello there,
item.description: * { text-align: justify; } I’m George. I study computer science and sometimes cook nice things. I’m particularly interested in cryptography, peer-to-peer technologies, and applications of virtual and augmented reality. I also enjoy longboarding, rock climbing, and searching for the perfect nacho dish. You can check out my resume, or my \(\LaTeX\)’d notes for some of the graduate courses I’ve taken at the Georgia Institute of Technology. So far, I have compiled a comprehensive introduction to computer vision as well as a brief overview of the applications of machine learning algorithms to financial trading.
